name: Monster-Mission
description: Monster hunting quest like Taekwon Mission - but for everyone.

mmhelp.description: Show all available commands if this module.

mmnew.description: Registers a new char and responds with the first mission.

mmkill.description:
Updates the killcount of the current mission of the given character.
Responds with new mission if killcount is >= 100.

mmreroll.description: Reroll the current mission to receive another monster target.

mmscore.description: Responds with the score of the requests character.

mmranking.description:
Responds with the current top ten high score.
Either of everyone or specific to the given class.
If `charName` is given the response will be the current place of the character wether overall or specific to the given class, plus the place +/- 1 in the ranking.
